title: Switch on the night
creator_credit: Sarah Royds, Susan Cornish, Alejandra Canales and AFTRS
brief_description: A poetic documentary exploring stories of seven refugee children in Australia – their experiences of immigration, their memories, dreams and fears. All of them have experienced life in Australian immigration detention centres in Villawood, Baxter and Port Hedland but a large part of this reality remains unseen.
creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Royds, Susan Cornish, Alejandra Canales and AFTRS
